song.title: Ode to My C64 Hammerfist
song.info:
You came from heaven, sent to fill me up with joy. My expectations rose as I played with my new toy. The music was stomping; my heart was pumping, ready to explode. Was it real or was it a dream? I could not really tell. Now those days are gone, but the memory remains of you.
The ultimate game machine, the ultimate waste of time. Sitting there for hours and hours: you became my life. Overnight, a score: C64.
As I said, those days are gone. They won't be back for very long, But when I fire you up again, I still feel full, Full of energy that lies within this lump of plastic box And the memory of old high scores and battles with my bro.
Another visitor! Stay a while. Stay forever! I-Ball! Game over!
But then Amiga came and stole my heart from you. I hope you will forgive me: I and you forever true.
The ultimate game machine, the ultimate waste of time. Sitting there for hours and hours: the computer that was my life, C64.
